Text.Page:
Good day, friend.

We need to demonstrate that we are capable of protecting the people of the federation. To this end, we would like you, , to venture into a variety of dangerous environments, and slay a number of monsters, then return with an Echelon Trophy as proof of our ability to handle any threat.

These beasts are to be found in different locations:

Balder's Temple (Normal)—{@linkcreature:425#8005#Auricadis}
Balder’s Temple (1 person)—{@linkcreature:825#6000#Nightmare Glaciernus}
Argon Core—{@linkcreature:426#20000#Meldita}
Manaya's Core—{@linkcreature:727#2007#Shandra Manaya}

Your work is exceptional, friend .

This token will help establish our trustworthiness, and help ensure that the Enlightened Union becomes the greatest power on the whole continent.

May the union long remember your name!
